title: what time will the patch be available?
body:
Around what time will the patch drop for download? I have a friend who has rather slow internet asking about when the patch will be available so they can start patching; That way they can start playing as soon as possible. It very well could take them an hour+ with how large this patch is supposed to be. 

( Thank the internet gods for fast internet and most of my patches are done in just minutes . )

If anyone knows roughly around what time the patch is available that would be greatly appreciated, ( East coast by the way .

replies.body: NA should have the patch now! Enjoy the new runes xD!!
